[DQC.IFRS.0126.9595] The statement [310000] Statement of comprehensive income, profit or loss, by function of expense includes an inconsistent calculation. The value of the concept ifrs-full:ProfitLossFromOperatingActivities of 10,813,000,000 should be equal to the sum of its child components defined in the calculation linkbase. The sum of these child components is 11,083,000,000. The values of the addends is determined by adding the values of the child concepts with a decimal value of -6. All values in the financial statements should use the same decimal value. The values reported in the financial statement in the current reporting period of 2021-01-01 to 2021-12-31 should be complete if the financial statement is to be mathematically accurate and complete. The components of ifrs-full:ProfitLossFromOperatingActivities that should add to 10,813,000,000 are comprised of the following:
+ ProfitLossFromOperatingActivitiesBeforeGainsOnFairValueAdjustmentsOfInvestmentPropertyAndDepreciation 5,645,000,000 - DepreciationAndAmortisationExpense -135,000,000 + GainsLossesOnDisposalsOfInvestmentProperties 88,000,000 + GainsLossesOnFairValueAdjustmentInvestmentProperty 5,215,000,000
The addends are calculated based on the calculation linkbase defined for [310000] Statement of comprehensive income, profit or loss, by function of expense. If addends are missing then the calculation tree should be amended. The rule will not add dimension components as the financial statement does not include a table. If dimensions are used on the statement then add a table to ensure that the dimensions are defined correctly.
Total Element : ifrs-full:ProfitLossFromOperatingActivities Total Value : 10,813,000,000 Total period : 2021-01-01 to 2021-12-31 Dimensions : Decimals : -6 Rule Element Id:9595 Rule version: 17.0.2 - https://filings.xbrl.org/2138005WRSDC4DI3BJ43/2021-12-31/ESEF/IS/0/2138005WRSDC4DI3BJ43-2021-12-31-is.zip/2138005WRSDC4DI3BJ43-2021-12-31-is/reports/eik-2021-12-31.html 7393

[DQC.IFRS.0126.9595] The statement [520000] Statement of cash flows, indirect method includes an inconsistent calculation. The value of the concept ifrs-full:CashFlowsFromUsedInOperationsBeforeChangesInWorkingCapital of 5,645,000,000 should be equal to the sum of its child components defined in the calculation linkbase. The sum of these child components is -15,981,000,000. The values of the addends is determined by adding the values of the child concepts with a decimal value of -6. All values in the financial statements should use the same decimal value. The values reported in the financial statement in the current reporting period of 2021-01-01 to 2021-12-31 should be complete if the financial statement is to be mathematically accurate and complete. The components of ifrs-full:CashFlowsFromUsedInOperationsBeforeChangesInWorkingCapital that should add to 5,645,000,000 are comprised of the following:
+ AfskriftirOgVirisryrnunDepreciationAmortisationAndImpairment 135,000,000 + AdjustmentsForFairValueGainsLosses -5,215,000,000 + AdjustmentsForLossesGainsOnDisposalOfNoncurrentAssets -88,000,000 - ProfitLossFromOperatingActivities 10,813,000,000
The addends are calculated based on the calculation linkbase defined for [520000] Statement of cash flows, indirect method. If addends are missing then the calculation tree should be amended. The rule will not add dimension components as the financial statement does not include a table. If dimensions are used on the statement then add a table to ensure that the dimensions are defined correctly.
Total Element : ifrs-full:CashFlowsFromUsedInOperationsBeforeChangesInWorkingCapital Total Value : 5,645,000,000 Total period : 2021-01-01 to 2021-12-31 Dimensions : Decimals : -6 Rule Element Id:9595 Rule version: 17.0.2 - https://filings.xbrl.org/2138005WRSDC4DI3BJ43/2021-12-31/ESEF/IS/0/2138005WRSDC4DI3BJ43-2021-12-31-is.zip/2138005WRSDC4DI3BJ43-2021-12-31-is/reports/eik-2021-12-31.html 7463
